name: Ax-Tract
description:
Cute axolotl game my team and I made for the Games Jobs Live Game Jam 2021.

Theme was "Strength lies in Differences" so we thought about Yin and Yang and how two halves make a whole.

Left and right arrows to move Yang, RightShift to interact

A and D to move Yin, E to interact

Bring Yin and Yang together and press F to combine them, or to separate them.

Hope you have fun, and thanks for downloading the game!
